resources.string:
"Welcome to the Wiimax Help Desk

"
"Thank you for purchasing this product. This section is here to help you connect and send " "text to your display.

 " "Let’s start. Follow these steps:

" "1. Connect to the wifi network with the name of the display. Input the provided password to " "connect to the display.
" "2. After launching this app, enter your text where you have been prompted to " "“type new message here!”
" "3. Press the button below to send to display.
" "4. The display will update with the new text.
" "Easy right? Its fast and simple.

"
"If the above method does not work, do the following:

" "1. Connect to the wifi network with the name of the display. Input the provided password to " "connect to the display.
" "2. Open your phone browser
" "3. Key in “192.168.254.1” where you usually input web addresses " "like www.google.com.
" "4. A page will open. It looks like the app.
" "5. Enter your text where you have been prompted to “type new message here!”
" "6. Press the button below to send to display.
" "7. The display will update with the new text.


"
"If all the above steps do not work, please contact us. " "Our contacts are found at the about us section.

"
